means: 很有害的，恶性的，致命的，险恶的

sentence.Network_en: I did what I could, but her mother's influence was pernicious.
sentence.Network_cn: 我已尽力了，但是她母亲贻害颇深。

sentence.Network_en: The principle had been pernicious from beginning to end.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条原则自始至终都是有害的.

sentence.Network_en: Business may be troublesome, but idleness is pernicious.
sentence.Network_cn: 事业虽扰人, 怠惰害更大.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin perniciosus 'destructive', from pernicies 'ruin', based on nex, nec- 'death'

entry.def: If you describe something as pernicious, you mean that it is very harmful.

example.ex: I did what I could, but her mother's influence was pernicious...
example.tran: 我已尽力了，但是她母亲贻害颇深。

example.ex: There is a pernicious culture of excellence: everything has to be not merely good but the best.
example.tran: 对于优秀存在着一种认识的误区：一切都务求最好。

means.word_mean: 2. working or spreading in a hidden and usually injurious way;

auth_sentence.content: Garlic was thought to have a particularly pernicious effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Garlic was thought to have a particularly pernicious effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Garlic was thought to have a particularly pernicious effect.

auth_sentence.content: Media spin can be a pernicious distorter of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Media spin can be a pernicious distorter of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Media spin can be a pernicious distorter of reality.

auth_sentence.content: This seems a completely fantastical and probably pernicious self-deception.
auth_sentence.res_content: This seems a completely fantastical and probably pernicious self-deception.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This seems a completely fantastical and probably pernicious self-deception.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落

sentences.en: The pernicious effect of this advertising on children is a problem that we ignore at our peril.
sentences.cn: 这则广告将对孩子有潜移默化的坏影响，我们置之不理，风险将由我们自己来承担。

sentences.en: Business may be troublesome,but idleness is pernicious.
sentences.cn: 事业虽扰人,怠惰害更大。

sentences.en: The principle had been pernicious from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 这条原则自始至终都是有害的。
